title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.12 - Materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.12 - Materials

State Regulations
(a) Where
traditional drafting techniques are used all drafting material shall be mylar
with a minimum thickness of 0.004 inch. (b) All line work, symbols and lettering
shall be uniform and consistent. The ink to be used should be recommended on
the manufacturer's label for use on the drafting material being used. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8189.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
